entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -18.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Arviat Airport 4:00 PM CDT Monday 27 March 2023
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -18.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -21.2°C
Wind: NNW 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning early this evening. Blowing snow at times. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:03 PM CDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow at times in the morning and early in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:03 PM CDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the evening. Wind becoming north 20 after midnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:03 PM CDT Monday 27 March 2023
